summary: Internal FBI email chain discussing a surprise press conference held in front of Jeffrey Epstein's mansion on January 27, 2020. The press conference was reportedly connected to Safe Horizon, a victim services organization, and included comments about the active investigation, specifically regarding Prince Andrew. FBI personnel express frustration about not being notified in advance and mention that victims were also upset about not being informed.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Answered at least one specific question about the investigation relating to Prince Andrew during the press conference at Epstein's mansion.

events.title: Press Conference at Epstein's Mansion
events.description: A press conference was held in front of Jeffrey Epstein's mansion, reportedly in connection with Safe Horizon. Comments were made about the active investigation, including specific questions about Prince Andrew.

keyFacts: A press conference was held at Jeffrey Epstein's mansion on January 27, 2020, which took FBI personnel by surprise as they were not notified in advance.
The press conference was reportedly connected to Safe Horizon, a victim services organization.
During the press conference, specific questions about the active investigation were addressed, including one relating to Prince Andrew.
FBI Victim Specialists fielded calls from irate victims who were not notified about the press conference.
The email indicates internal communication issues within the FBI regarding public events related to the Epstein investigation.
